verbose_text: Consistent with this notion, when CAKI-1 cells were cultured under hypoxia for different time courses, we found a significantly decreased expression of the epithelial markers E-cadherin and ZO-1 and increased expression of the mesenchymal markers including N-cadherin, vimentin, beta-catenin, and the stem cell marker Nanog compared to normoxia (0 hours) cultures at the protein level.
evidence: expression of the epithelial markers E-cadherin
